docs.text: $socket.raw.client $socket.raw.client.start({ port: 1234, max_clients: 32, }) $socket.raw.client.end $socket.raw.client.update $socket.raw.client.send({ data: { x: args.inputs.mouse.x, y: args.inputs.mouse.y, pressed: args.inputs.mouse.button_left, } } )
